p: Pediococcus acidilactici NRRL B-5627 was selected to test the capacity of SBP and HP as an organic nitrogen source in low-cost culture media. Carnobacterium piscicola CECT 4020 (Spanish Type Culture Collection) was the target bacteria for bacteriocin (Pediocin SA-1) determination. The stock cultures were stored at −80 °C on Man, Rogosa, and Sharpe medium (MRS) with 25% glycerol. Inocula (0.5%, v/ v) consisted of cellular suspensions from 16 h aged in MRS (incubated at 30 °C) and adjusted to an optical density-OD (700 nm) of 0.900.
